questions.question: Describe the role of bootstrap loader in booting a computer system.
How is distinction of kernel code from user code achieved at hardware level?
List and explain the various synchronous and asynchronous methods of message passing in IPC.
What is meant by race condition? Explain with the help of an example.
Explain the two strategies used to recover from a deadlock.
Differentiate between compile time and load time address binding.

Define seek time, rotational latency and disk bandwidth of disks.
Explain two level directory structure with the help of a diagram.

(i) Preemptive priority scheduling (ii) Nonpreemtive priority scheduling
(iii) Non-preemptive Shortest Job first scheduling.
